text:
The making of me as Iron Man.

 Midjourney + Nano + Kinetix + Astra:

1. Go to Midjourney.
2. Prompt: "iron man fighting in Paris --ar 4:5".
3. Generate it + upscale it on Gemini Nano-Banana.
4. Download the upscaled image, save it for later.
5. Record yourself playing out what you want.
6. Go to Kinetix (beta testers only for now).
7. Upload your recorded video + upscaled image.
8. Kinetix generates 4x videos, with camera control.
9. Download one and upscale it using Astra.

Full video step-by-step: https://lnkd.in/d4UQkppd
